definitions.definition: A frame consisting of two bars crossing each other at right angles and turning on a post or pin, to hinder the passage of animals, but admitting a person to pass between the arms; a turnstile .
A gate or bar set across a road to stop carriages, animals, and sometimes people, until a toll is paid,
A beam filled with spikes to obstruct passage ; a cheval de frise .
A toll road , especially a toll expressway .
A trajectory on a finite time interval that satisfies an optimality criterion which is associated with a cost function .

main_definition: A frame consisting of two bars crossing each other at right angles and turning on a post or pin, to hinder the passage of animals, but admitting a person to pass between the arms; a turnstile .
secondary_definitions: A gate or bar set across a road to stop carriages, animals, and sometimes people, until a toll is paid,
( military ) A beam filled with spikes to obstruct passage ; a cheval de frise .
( chiefly US ) A toll road , especially a toll expressway .
( mathematical economics ) A trajectory on a finite time interval that satisfies an optimality criterion which is associated with a cost function .
